gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Lakers 124, Pelicans 108
gameRecap.excerpt: LeBron James put up his fifth triple-double of the season, and 112th of his career as the Lakers defeated the Pelicans, 124-108. James recorded 28 points, 11 rebounds and a season-high 17 assists for the Lakers, while Anthony Davis added 30 points and 11 rebounds in the victory. CJ McCollum tallied 25 points and seven assists for the Pelicans in the losing effort. The Lakers finish the regular season at 47-35, while the Pelicans finish 49-33.
